entry.title: Pro-Sifat-Hasan/chatnest: ChatNest is a lightweight, customizable, and easy-to-integrate JavaScript widget for adding chat functionality to your web applications. It comes with a flexible configuration system, allowing you to tailor the chatbot's appearance and behavior to suit your app's needs.
entry.content: ChatNest is a lightweight, customizable, and easy-to-integrate JavaScript widget for adding chat functionality to your web applications. It comes with a flexible configuration system, allowing you to tailor the chatbot's appearance and behavior to suit your app's needs.

entry.title: ljt019/exhibit_manager: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Rocket and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.
entry.content: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Rocket and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.
